Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Effects of a new calcium antagonist , CD - 832 , on isoproterenol - induced myocardial ischemia in dogs with partial coronary stenosis .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| calcium antagonist |
| CD-832 |
| isoproterenol |

In this paragraph, "calcium antagonist" and "CD-832" are the chemical entities mentioned. "Isoproterenol" is also a chemical, but it was not specified as a calcium antagonist in this context, so it was not included in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| CD-832 (calcium antagonist) |
| isoproterenol |

In this paragraph, "CD-832" is identified as a calcium antagonist, so both "CD-832" and "calcium antagonist" refer to the same chemical entity. Therefore, only one entry is needed in the table. "Isoproterenol" is also a chemical, but it was not specified as a calcium antagonist in this context, so it is included as a separate entry.
